report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-27854 WordPress Vulnerability
Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-27854 WordPress Vulnerability
text: Psychological tests & quizzes plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability by using the wpt_test_page_submit_button_caption parameter to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victims Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victims cookie-based authentication credentials.

report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-27854 WordPress Vulnerability

Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-27854 WordPress Vulnerability
text: WordPress Psychological tests & quizzes Plugin for WordPress 0.21.19

report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-27854 WordPress Vulnerability
text: Upgrade to the latest version of WordPress Plugin, available from the WordPress Plugin Directory.
